participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious, Alex loves exploring new ideas and pushing her limits both in academics and in her hobbies.
participant_1.background: i am also a graduate student. i walk dogs for a living. my parents taught me survival skills. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Confident and thrill-seeking, Jordan enjoys the adrenaline rush of racing and values safety while pursuing his passion.
participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

content.text: i am a graduate student, i am studying to be a psychology professor. what do you do?
